title: [Health] American Indians, Alaska Natives see 5-fold rise in overdose deaths. The rise in overdose deaths outpaced a roughly 30% rise in the cumulative populations of these communities, to nearly 2.3 million in 2019 from 1.8 million 20 years earlier
